QuestData.Title: A Loa Without a Temple
QuestData.Description:
I have given some thought about your situation, $n.
It is not your fault dat de goblin deceived us. I followed along with his scheme as well. From today, you have my forgiveness.
But dat cannot help de little one. I fear we may lose it, if we do not act. We must ask de wanderer's loa, de mountain dat moves, de great bulwark, de greatmother of direhorns, to save her child.
Take dis offering to her shrine and ask for her boon... and her forgiveness.
